alert.note: Alert for Haines Borough and Klukwan (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 29 at 5:20PM AKST until November 30 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...PASSING FRONT TO BRING SNOW TO NORTHERN LYNN CANAL... .Northerly winds ahead of a gale force front brought in colder weather to the Northern Lynn Canal area, morning temps are in the upper 20s to near 30. Wednesday afternoon, the incoming front is bringing moisture to the panhandle that will last into Thursday. As this moisture collides with the cold air in the north, snow is likely. For the highway and higher elevations near Haines, heavy snow up to 6 inches is expected over a 12 to 15 hour time frame. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Haines Borough and Klukwan. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. People are urged to prepare their property before the onset of winter weather. For the latest road conditions, where available, call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
